attributes.action: Stop the sale of arms to Israel.
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition asking the British government to halt all arms sales to Israel, a nation that is currently indiscriminately murdering civilians in the Gaza Strip. air-strikes are used irresponsibly in densely populated urban areas which leads to the deaths of non-combatants and children. British businesses, with the aid of the British Government are supplying Israel with the arms they require to carry out these indiscriminate killings. We demand an end to the Government's collusion with Israel's war on the Palestinian people/
